info.name: Only Hide Hovered Link Target Urls - Fx 4+
info.description:
For Firefox 4+ and latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds.

This hides only the Hovered Link Target URLs from showing at bottom of screen without disturbing the connection status messages, so the Connection Status Display popup flickering won't be so annoying. Due to (bug 541656 - Display hyperlink URLs at bottom of window (instead of right side of location bar))

Tested on Firefox 4+ and up to latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

Credit for code goes to:

User Chris000001 on: http://forums.mozillazine.org/

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
info.additionalInfo:
Updated 02-05-2011
Fixed compatibility problem with style 43467

****"For those of you that want to have "Hovered Link Target URLs" back in the Address Bar"****

Use extension "Link Location Bar": https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/link-location-bar/versions/ . Or use the latest version of "[Ext] Status-4-Evar": https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/status-4-evar/versions/ , which works well with userstyle: style 46076
